mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gantry_device_config ( machine_id,operate_user_id,operate_user_erp,operate_user_name, update_user_erp,update_user_name,create_site_code,create_site_name,business_type, business_type_remark,send_code,start_time,end_time,lock_status,lock_user_erp,lock_user_name, yn) VALUES ( #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{operateUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{operateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{createSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessTypeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now() ,date_add(now(), INTERVAL 1 day),1,#{lockUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lockUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1)
